/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/ffplay.dir/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/ffplay/Frame.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ffplay.dir/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/ffplay/Clock.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ffplay.dir/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/ffplay/PacketQueue.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ffplay.dir/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/ffplay/FrameQueue.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ffplay.dir/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/ffplay/Decoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ffplay.dir/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/ffplay/VideoState.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ffplay.dir/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/ffplay/main.cpp.o  -o ffplay  -L/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/platforms/cmake/../../ffmpeg/lib -Wl,-Bstatic -lavcodec -lavdevice -lavfilter -lavformat -lavutil -lswresample -lswscale -Wl,-Bdynamic -Wl,-rpath,/home/xxl/文档/项目/ffplay/platforms/cmake/../../ffmpeg/lib
